typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Jaar as string,
		{Strategische doelstelling} as string,
		{Operationele doelstelling} as string,
		Code as string,
		Label as string,
		{Korte omschrijving} as string,
		{Lange omschrijving} as string,
		Commentaar as string,
		Verantwoordelijke as string,
		Opvolger as string,
		Budgethouder as string,
		Aanvang as string,
		Voltooiing as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> AP
FilterOnYear derive(Cluster1 = 'Actieplan',
		Taskgroup = concat(Code,' ',{Korte omschrijving}),
		Role1 = 'Verantwoordelijke',
		Role2 = 'Opvolger',
		Role3 = 'Budgethouder') ~> DerivedColumn1
AP filter(toInteger(Jaar) == year(currentDate())) ~> FilterOnYear
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		Cluster1,
		TaskgroupGlobalID = Code,
		ProjectCode = Code,
		Taskgroup,
		Role1,
		Role1UserGlobalIDs = Verantwoordelijke,
		Role2,
		Role2UserGlobalIDs = Opvolger,
		Role3,
		Role3UserGlobalIDs = Budgethouder
	)) ~> SinkToTaskGroup

source(output(
		Jaar as string,
		Volgnummer as string,
		Company as string,
		Dossier as string,
		Betalende as string,
		{Algemene rekening} as string,
		Beleidsitem as string,
		Kostenplaats as string,
		Investeringsproject as string,
		Investeringssubproject as string,
		Actieplan as string,
		Actie as string,
		{Bestelbon jaar} as string,
		{Bestelbon nummer} as string,
		{Aanwinst jaar} as string,
		{Aanwinst nummer} as string,
		Code as string,
		Bedrag as string,
		{Verbruikt/Ontvangen} as string,
		Omschrijving as string,
		Datum as string,
		Budgethouder as string,
		Sector as string,
		{Faktuur jaar} as string,
		{Faktuur nummer} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> VB
source(output(
		Jaar as string,
		{Strategische doelstelling} as string,
		{Operationele doelstelling} as string,
		Code as string,
		Label as string,
		{Korte omschrijving} as string,
		{Lange omschrijving} as string,
		Commentaar as string,
		Verantwoordelijke as string,
		Opvolger as string,
		Budgethouder as string,
		Aanvang as string,
		Voltooiing as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> AP
source(output(
		Jaar as string,
		{Code strategische doelstelling} as string,
		{Label strategische doelstelling} as string,
		Code as string,
		Label as string,
		{Korte omschrijving} as string,
		{Lange omschrijving} as string,
		Commentaar as string,
		Prioritair as string,
		Verantwoordelijke as string,
		Opvolger as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OD
source(output(
		Boekjaar as string,
		Code as string,
		Label as string,
		{Korte omschrijving} as string,
		{Lange omschrijving} as string,
		Verantwoordelijke as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SD
source(output(
		Boekjaar as string,
		Beleidsitem as string,
		Beleidsveld as string,
		Omschrijving as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BI
FilterOnYearAndCodeAanwending derive({Verbruikt/Ontvangen} = iif({Verbruikt/Ontvangen} === 'U', 'Charges', iif({Verbruikt/Ontvangen}==='O','Earnings','Unknown')),
		PeriodSliceCode = concat('Aanwending_',Jaar),
		FreeField03 = concat({Bestelbon jaar},'/',{Bestelbon nummer}),
		FreeField04 = concat({Aanwinst jaar},'/',{Aanwinst nummer}),
		FreeField05 = concat({Faktuur jaar},'/',{Faktuur nummer})) ~> TranslateVebruiktOntvangen
TranslateVebruiktOntvangen, AP join(Actieplan == AP@Code
	&& VB@Jaar == AP@Jaar,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> VBAP
VBAP, OD join({Operationele doelstelling} == OD@Label
	&& AP@Jaar == OD@Jaar,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> VBAPOD
VBAPOD, SD join({Strategische doelstelling} == SD@Label
	&& VB@Jaar == Boekjaar,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> VBAPODSD
VBAPODSD, BI join(VB@Beleidsitem == BI@Beleidsitem
	&& VB@Jaar == BI@Boekjaar,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> VBAPODSDBI
VB filter(Code =='BAWD' || Code == 'BCOR') ~> FilterOnYearAndCodeAanwending
VBAPODSDBI sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		PeriodSliceCode,
		FinancialID = {Algemene rekening},
		LineItemTypeCode = {Verbruikt/Ontvangen},
		Amount = Bedrag,
		ProjectCode = Actie,
		ProjectCode_1 = Actieplan,
		ProjectCode_2 = OD@Label,
		ProjectCode_3 = SD@Label,
		ProjectCode_4 = Company,
		ProjectCode_5 = VB@Budgethouder,
		ProjectCode_6 = Investeringsproject,
		ProjectCode_7 = Investeringssubproject,
		ProjectCode_8 = Kostenplaats,
		ProjectCode_9 = Sector,
		Code = VB@Beleidsitem,
		Description = BI@Omschrijving,
		BookYear = VB@Jaar,
		BookDateTime = Datum,
		Version = Volgnummer,
		VersionDescription = VB@Omschrijving,
		FreeField01 = Dossier,
		FreeField02 = Betalende,
		FreeField03,
		FreeField04,
		FreeField05,
		FreeField06 = VB@Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> VBResults

source(output(
		Jaar as string,
		Actieplan as string,
		Code as string,
		Prioritair as string,
		Omschrijving as string,
		Commentaar as string,
		Verantwoordelijke as string,
		Opvolger as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['invoer/AC*.csv']) ~> AC
FilterOnCurrentYear derive(Cluster1 = 'Actie',
		Taskgroup = concat(Code,' ',Omschrijving),
		Role1 = 'Verantwoordelijke',
		Role2 = 'Opvolger',
		TagGroup1 = 'Prioritair/Niet-prioritair',
		TagGroup1Tags = iif(Prioritair ==='true','Prioritair','Niet-prioritair')) ~> AdditionalColumns
AC filter(toInteger(Jaar) == year(currentDate())) ~> FilterOnCurrentYear
AdditionalColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		Cluster1,
		TaskgroupGlobalID = Code,
		ProjectCode = Code,
		Taskgroup,
		Role1,
		Role1UserGlobalIDs = Verantwoordelijke,
		Role2,
		Role2UserGlobalIDs = Opvolger,
		TagGroup1,
		TagGroup1Tags
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkToTaskGroup

source(output(
		Boekjaar as string,
		{Algemene rekening} as string,
		Omschrijving as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> AR
AR filter(toInteger(Boekjaar) == year(currentDate())) ~> FilterOnCurrentYear
FilterOnCurrentYear derive(Cluster1 = 'Algemene rekening',
		Taskgroup = concat({Algemene rekening},' ', Omschrijving)) ~> AddColumns
AddColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		TaskgroupGlobalID = {Algemene rekening},
		FinancialID = {Algemene rekening},
		Cluster1,
		Taskgroup
	)) ~> SinkToTaskGroupResults

source(output(
		Boekjaar as string,
		Beleidsdomein as string,
		Omschrijving as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['invoer/BD*.csv']) ~> BD
FilterOnCurrentYear derive(Cluster1 = 'Beleidsdomein') ~> AddCluster
BD filter(toInteger(Boekjaar) == year(currentDate())) ~> FilterOnCurrentYear
AddCluster sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		TaskgroupGlobalID = Beleidsdomein,
		ProjectCode = Beleidsdomein,
		Taskgroup = Omschrijving,
		Cluster1
	)) ~> SinkToTaskGroupResults

source(output(
		{Jaar opmaak} as string,
		{Algemene rekening} as string,
		Beleidsitem as string,
		Kostenplaats as string,
		Investeringsproject as string,
		Investeringssubproject as string,
		Actieplan as string,
		Actie as string,
		Company as string,
		{U/F} as string,
		{AR Omschrijving} as string,
		Omschrijving as string,
		Budgethouder as string,
		Sector as string,
		Groep as string,
		Dienst as string,
		Initieel as string,
		Totaal as string,
		{Totaal wijz} as string,
		{Totaal aanp} as string,
		{Totaal raming} as string,
		{Totaal amjp} as string,
		{Budget mjp} as string,
		{Budget mjp1} as string,
		{Budget mjp2} as string,
		{Budget mjp3} as string,
		{Budget mjp4} as string,
		{Budget mjp5} as string,
		Overdracht as string,
		Overgedragen as string,
		{Verbruikt/Ontvangen} as string,
		Beschikbaar as string,
		Afdrukvolgorde as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['invoer/BG*.csv']) ~> BG
source(output(
		Jaar as string,
		{Code strategische doelstelling} as string,
		{Label strategische doelstelling} as string,
		Code as string,
		Label as string,
		{Korte omschrijving} as string,
		{Lange omschrijving} as string,
		Commentaar as string,
		Prioritair as string,
		Verantwoordelijke as string,
		Opvolger as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['invoer/OD*.csv']) ~> OD
source(output(
		Boekjaar as string,
		Code as string,
		Label as string,
		{Korte omschrijving} as string,
		{Lange omschrijving} as string,
		Verantwoordelijke as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SD
source(output(
		Boekjaar as string,
		Beleidsitem as string,
		Beleidsveld as string,
		Omschrijving as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BI
source(output(
		Jaar as string,
		{Strategische doelstelling} as string,
		{Operationele doelstelling} as string,
		Code as string,
		Label as string,
		{Korte omschrijving} as string,
		{Lange omschrijving} as string,
		Commentaar as string,
		Verantwoordelijke as string,
		Opvolger as string,
		Budgethouder as string,
		Aanvang as string,
		Voltooiing as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> AP
UFChange, MinAP join(Actieplan == Code
	&& {Jaar opmaak} == Jaar,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> BGAP
BGAP, MinOD join({Operationele doelstelling} == Label
	&& MinAP@Jaar == MinOD@Jaar,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> BGAPOD
BGAPOD, MinSD join({Strategische doelstelling} == MinSD@Label
	&& MinAP@Jaar == Boekjaar,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> BGAPODSD
BGAPODSD, BI join(BG@Beleidsitem == BI@Beleidsitem
	&& {Jaar opmaak} == BI@Boekjaar,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> BGAPODSDBI
Filter1 derive({U/F} = iif({U/F} === 'U', 
    'Charges',
    iif({U/F}==='O', 'Earnings','Unknown')),
		hash = sha2(256, concat(iifNull({Jaar opmaak},'',{Jaar opmaak}),iifNull({Algemene rekening},'',{Algemene rekening}),iifNull({Beleidsitem},'',{Beleidsitem}),iifNull({Kostenplaats},'',{Kostenplaats}),iifNull({Investeringsproject},'',{Investeringsproject}),iifNull({Investeringssubproject},'',{Investeringssubproject}),iifNull({Actieplan},'',{Actieplan}),iifNull({Actie},'',{Actie}),iifNull({Company},'',{Company}),iifNull({Budgethouder},'',{Budgethouder}),iifNull({Sector},'',{Sector}),iifNull({Groep},'',{Groep}),iifNull({Dienst},'',{Dienst})))) ~> UFChange
AP select(mapColumn(
		Jaar,
		{Strategische doelstelling},
		{Operationele doelstelling},
		Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MinAP
OD select(mapColumn(
		Jaar,
		Label
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MinOD
SD select(mapColumn(
		Boekjaar,
		Label
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MinSD
BG filter(toInteger({Jaar opmaak}) > (year(currentDate())-2)) ~> Filter1
BGAPODSDBI sink(input(
		{Jaar opmaak} as string,
		{Algemene rekening} as string,
		Beleidsitem as string,
		Kostenplaats as string,
		Investeringsproject as string,
		Investeringssubproject as string,
		Actieplan as string,
		Actie as string,
		Company as string,
		{U/F} as string,
		BG_Omschrijving as string,
		Omschrijving as string,
		Budgethouder as string,
		Sector as string,
		Groep as string,
		Dienst as string,
		Initieel as string,
		Totaal as string,
		{Totaal wijz} as string,
		{Totaal aanp} as string,
		{Totaal raming} as string,
		{Totaal amjp} as string,
		{Budget mjp} as string,
		{Budget mjp1} as string,
		{Budget mjp2} as string,
		{Budget mjp3} as string,
		{Budget mjp4} as string,
		{Budget mjp5} as string,
		Overdracht as string,
		Overgedragen as string,
		Beschikbaar as string,
		Code as string,
		SD_Label as string,
		OD_Label as string,
		Beleidsveld as string,
		hash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'tempcombinedbudgetlines.csv',
	mapColumn(
		{Jaar opmaak},
		{Algemene rekening},
		Beleidsitem = BG@Beleidsitem,
		Kostenplaats,
		Investeringsproject,
		Investeringssubproject,
		Actieplan,
		Actie,
		Company,
		{U/F},
		Omschrijving = BI@Omschrijving,
		Budgethouder,
		Sector,
		Groep,
		Dienst,
		Initieel,
		Totaal,
		{Totaal wijz},
		{Totaal aanp},
		{Totaal raming},
		{Totaal amjp},
		{Budget mjp},
		{Budget mjp1},
		{Budget mjp2},
		{Budget mjp3},
		{Budget mjp4},
		{Budget mjp5},
		Overdracht,
		Overgedragen,
		Beschikbaar,
		Code,
		SD_Label = MinSD@Label,
		OD_Label = MinOD@Label,
		Beleidsveld,
		hash,
		BG_Omschrijving = BG@Omschrijving
	)) ~> RegelsTotaal

source(output(
		Jaar_opmaak as integer,
		Algemene_rekening as string,
		Beleidsitem as string,
		Kostenplaats as string,
		Investeringsproject as string,
		Investeringssubproject as string,
		Actieplan as string,
		Actie as string,
		Company as string,
		UF as string,
		Omschrijving as string,
		Budgethouder as string,
		Sector as string,
		Groep as string,
		Dienst as string,
		Initieel as double,
		Totaal as double,
		Totaal_wijz as double,
		Totaal_aanp as double,
		Totaal_raming as double,
		Totaal_amjp as double,
		Budget_mjp as double,
		Budget_mjp1 as double,
		Budget_mjp2 as double,
		Budget_mjp3 as double,
		Budget_mjp4 as double,
		Budget_mjp5 as double,
		Overdracht as double,
		Overgedragen as double,
		Beschikbaar as double,
		Code as string,
		SD_Label as string,
		OD_Label as string,
		Beleidsveld as string,
		hash as string,
		BG_Omschrijving as string,
		operation as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> JoinedBudgetLines
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Initieel_', toString({Jaar_opmaak}))) ~> AddPSCTotaal
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Wijz_', toString({Jaar_opmaak}))) ~> AddPSCWijzingen
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Aanp_', toString({Jaar_opmaak}))) ~> AddPSCAanpassingen
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Amjp_', toString({Jaar_opmaak}))) ~> AddPSCAmjp
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Mjp_', toString({Jaar_opmaak}))) ~> AddPSCMjp
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Mjp_', toString(toInteger({Jaar_opmaak})+1))) ~> AddPSCMjp1
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Mjp_', toString(toInteger({Jaar_opmaak})+2))) ~> AddPSCMjp2
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Mjp_', toString(toInteger({Jaar_opmaak})+3))) ~> AddPSCMjp3
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Mjp_', toString(toInteger({Jaar_opmaak})+4))) ~> AddPSCMjp4
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Mjp_', toString(toInteger({Jaar_opmaak})+5))) ~> AddPSCMjp5
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Overdracht_', toString({Jaar_opmaak}))) ~> AddPSCOverdracht
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Overgedragen_', toString({Jaar_opmaak}))) ~> AddPSCOvergedragen
JoinedBudgetLines derive(PeriodSliceCode = concat('Budget_Totaal_', toString({Jaar_opmaak}))) ~> AddPSCInitieel
AddPSCInitieel sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		FinancialID = Algemene_rekening,
		LineItemTypeCode = UF,
		ProjectCode_1 = Actie,
		ProjectCode_2 = Actieplan,
		ProjectCode_3 = OD_Label,
		ProjectCode_4 = SD_Label,
		ProjectCode_5 = Budgethouder,
		ProjectCode_6 = Investeringsproject,
		ProjectCode_7 = Investeringssubproject,
		ProjectCode_8 = Kostenplaats,
		ProjectCode_9 = Sector,
		ProjectCode_10 = Groep,
		ProjectCode_11 = Dienst,
		Code = Beleidsitem,
		Description = Omschrijving,
		VersionDescription = BG_Omschrijving,
		Amount = Initieel,
		PeriodSliceCode,
		BookYear = Jaar_opmaak,
		hash
	)) ~> RegelsInitieel
AddPSCTotaal sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		FinancialID = Algemene_rekening,
		LineItemTypeCode = UF,
		ProjectCode_1 = Actie,
		ProjectCode_2 = Actieplan,
		ProjectCode_3 = OD_Label,
		ProjectCode_4 = SD_Label,
		ProjectCode_5 = Budgethouder,
		ProjectCode_6 = Investeringsproject,
		ProjectCode_7 = Investeringssubproject,
		ProjectCode_8 = Kostenplaats,
		ProjectCode_9 = Sector,
		ProjectCode_10 = Groep,
		ProjectCode_11 = Dienst,
		Code = Beleidsitem,
		Description = Omschrijving,
		VersionDescription = BG_Omschrijving,
		Amount = Totaal,
		PeriodSliceCode,
		BookYear = Jaar_opmaak,
		hash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RegelsTotaal
AddPSCOvergedragen sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		FinancialID = Algemene_rekening,
		LineItemTypeCode = UF,
		ProjectCode_1 = Actie,
		ProjectCode_2 = Actieplan,
		ProjectCode_3 = OD_Label,
		ProjectCode_4 = SD_Label,
		ProjectCode_5 = Budgethouder,
		ProjectCode_6 = Investeringsproject,
		ProjectCode_7 = Investeringssubproject,
		ProjectCode_8 = Kostenplaats,
		ProjectCode_9 = Sector,
		ProjectCode_10 = Groep,
		ProjectCode_11 = Dienst,
		Code = Beleidsitem,
		Description = Omschrijving,
		VersionDescription = BG_Omschrijving,
		Amount = Overgedragen,
		PeriodSliceCode,
		BookYear = Jaar_opmaak,
		hash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RegelsOvergedragen
AddPSCOverdracht sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		FinancialID = Algemene_rekening,
		LineItemTypeCode = UF,
		ProjectCode_1 = Actie,
		ProjectCode_2 = Actieplan,
		ProjectCode_3 = OD_Label,
		ProjectCode_4 = SD_Label,
		ProjectCode_5 = Budgethouder,
		ProjectCode_6 = Investeringsproject,
		ProjectCode_7 = Investeringssubproject,
		ProjectCode_8 = Kostenplaats,
		ProjectCode_9 = Sector,
		ProjectCode_10 = Groep,
		ProjectCode_11 = Dienst,
		Code = Beleidsitem,
		Description = Omschrijving,
		VersionDescription = BG_Omschrijving,
		Amount = Overdracht,
		PeriodSliceCode,
		BookYear = Jaar_opmaak,
		hash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RegelsOverdracht
AddPSCMjp5 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		FinancialID = Algemene_rekening,
		LineItemTypeCode = UF,
		ProjectCode_1 = Actie,
		ProjectCode_2 = Actieplan,
		ProjectCode_3 = OD_Label,
		ProjectCode_4 = SD_Label,
		ProjectCode_5 = Budgethouder,
		ProjectCode_6 = Investeringsproject,
		ProjectCode_7 = Investeringssubproject,
		ProjectCode_8 = Kostenplaats,
		ProjectCode_9 = Sector,
		ProjectCode_10 = Groep,
		ProjectCode_11 = Dienst,
